mapper.insert: insert into mate_board (user_id, region_id, age_range_id, title, content, thumbnail, start_date, end_date, recruit_number, gender) values (#{userId}, #{regionId}, #{ageRangeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{recruitNumber}, #{gender})
insert into mate_matching_alarm (mate_board_id, sender_id, content) values (#{mateBoardId}, #{senderId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, region_id as regionId, age_range_id as ageRangeId, title, content, thumbnail, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, recruit_number as recruitNumber, gender, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, is_finish as isFinish FROM mate_board where id = #{id}
select id, age_range_id as ageRange, gender from user where id = #{id}

SELECT mb.id AS mateBoardId, u.nickname AS nickname, mb.content AS content, mb.title AS title, mb.thumbnail AS thumbnail, mb.start_date AS startDate, mb.end_date AS endDate, ar.range_description AS ageRange FROM mate_board mb JOIN user u ON mb.user_id = u.id JOIN age_range ar ON mb.age_range_id = ar.id
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND nickname LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND mb.id BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY mb.id DESC;
